title: Paris
description: The places I have most enjoyed photographing in Paris are the [Tuileries Gardens](https://www.flickr.com/search/?user_id=40526588%40N00&sort=date-taken-desc&text=tuileries&view_all=1) and the [Pompidou Centre](https://www.flickr.com/search/?user_id=40526588%40N00&sort=date-taken-desc&text=pompidou%20centre&view_all=1) in Beaubourg.
